GSD.description:
fbdev: smscufx: Fix use-after-free in ufx_ops_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 3742e9fd552e6c4193ebc5eb3d2cd02d429cad9c. For more details please see the references link.
